pages.text: Torches and your other light sources have one crucial weakness: you can only place them when you're already in the dark.$(br)The Radiance Staff, charged enough, can place lights far away and in the air, illuminating large caverns at a distance.$(br)As a final goodie, these lights are invisible, making them great for athmospherically illuminating your structures. They can also be placed under water.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Right click placed lights with the staff to adjust the emitted light level.
